main event: A UFO sighting was reported on October 6, 1961, in Sharon, Massachusetts, where the object was observed standing still at times and rushing away.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for around 5 minutes., The object was described as bright and silverish white., The witness was a 14-year-old male student., The sighting occurred at a soccer game where the witness first noticed the object by looking up., The report indicates that the witness thought it could possibly be a flying saucer.
witness description: A 14-year-old male student, along with another person.
